query: OMG (Oxford MS Gravel) gravel race Oxford

videos.title: OMG Gravel Race Oxford MS , #1 Mississippi Gravel Cup 2022
videos.description: Race #1 of the 2022 Mississippi Gravel Cup was held on January 8, 2022. It was a challenging but really great race. here is a little video

videos.title: OMG50 Oxford Quick Vid
videos.description: First race of the Ms Gravel Cup 2020.  OMG 25/50/100 in Oxford, MS.  Holly Springs Natl Forest.

videos.title: OMG Gravel Cup 2023, Oxford MS #BikeTourOxfordMS
videos.description: There are more than 300 participants. Too late to sign up this year, shot the video from the car instead.

videos.title: MS Gravel Cup - Oxford OMG Gravel Course Rundown PLUS 3 KEYS to Success!!
videos.description:
Are you racing the 2021 MS Gravel Cup in Oxford MS?

Coach Bryant runs down through some of the main features of the course and gives his 3 major KEYS TO SUCCESS...especially if you are wanting to be at the front of the race.

Want more course previews...leave a comment and let us know!
